nodes.bodyText: maybe make the members final as they are meant to be set once per instantiation ?

Since the signature is not the same maybe it could get rid off the 2 suffix ?
if the args are not splittable and end in single object collections the name would still be relevant.
Or is it because of the alias creation you need a distinct name ?
it seems you can define the arguments types as in java.lang.Integer.parseInt(java.lang.String, int): https://www.h2database.com/html/commands.html#create_alias
Not sure the result would be pretty with a Connection, 3 String and 1 boolean though...
